General.Name: Parkit Enterprise Inc
General.Description: Parkit Enterprise Inc. is a real estate investment firm specializing in acquisition and operation of income-producing parking facilities. The firm seeks to invest in the United States. Parkit Enterprise Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.

1.Name: Ms. JoAnne Claudia Odette C.A., CPA, CA, CPA
1.Title: Co-Chief Financial Officer
